song.title: Set a Fire
song.lyrics:
[V] .D No Place I'd rather be .G No Place I'd rather be .Bm No place I'd rather be .G Here in Your love, Here in Your love
[C] .D A G Set a Fire Down in my soul . Bm That I cant contain that I can't control . G I want more of You God, I want more of You God
[B] . D I want more I want more . G I want more I want more . Bm I want more I want more of You . G Won't You pour it out
